summury: Hello, I'm Mohammed Elmostafa, a Front-End Developer specializing in performance optimization and user experience. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and React. I've successfully completed several projects and excel in fast learning and problem-solving. I always strive to improve my skills and deliver the best technical solutions.

eltech.name: ELTECH
eltech.content: A website for ELTECH Software Solutions Company to display its services.

web.name: Mobile Development
web.content: I specialize in creating high-quality mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms. I ensure seamless performance, user-friendly interfaces, and advanced functionalities to provide a top-notch mobile experience.

mobile.name: Web Development
mobile.content: I offer web development services, including building responsive, dynamic, and interactive websites. My focus is on delivering robust web solutions that cater to your business needs, ensuring a smooth user experience and high performance across all devices.
